subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Blackhawks center Jonathan Toews doesn’t care for his nickname, Captain Serious, but he is certainly living up to it. Toews, the steely-eyed captain, sounds like an elder statesman even if he does not look the part.
snippet: Blackhawks center Jonathan Toews doesn’t care for his nickname, Captain Serious, but he is certainly living up to it. Toews, the steely-eyed captain, sounds like an elder statesman even if he does not look the part.
